message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high.  Could you do $125?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
